alert.note: Alert for Lower Washington County; South Central Utah (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 14 at 5:10PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Washington County through 545 PM MDT... At 510 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles southwest of Apple Valley, or 15 miles west of Colorado City. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of south central Washington County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Lower Washington County; South Central Utah
